attributes.action: for parents to be able to decide whether the father or the mother takes 9 months off when a new baby is born
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: couples having babies should be able to decide if the mother has a few weeks off and the father takes 9 months off to raise the child. Instead of the mother having 9 months and the father just 2 weeks.
